txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have headed north into the Misty Mountains to seek old remembrance and find a bit of sport. Others have come with me, and our camp can be found to the west of the path that leads north out of Rivendell.

Seek me out, if you will.

Glóin

'Look here: an adventurous soul,

'Good to see you. Look about you: many a dwarf here, and all with something or other to do. I never thought that seeing these mountains would restore such vigour in me, but I feel better already.

'If you are looking for work, we have it, I promise you this.'
Glóin sent a letter requesting your presence at his encampment north of Rivendell in the Misty Mountains.
Talk to Glóin at his camp in the Misty Mountains

Glóin's camp is west off of the road that leads up and north out of Rivendell. Seek him out and speak with him.\n\nGlóin sent a request for you to come and visit him at his encampment in the Misty Mountains.
